DOC.brief_summary: In patient treated Non invasive ventilation ( NIV ) due acute hypercapnic respiratory failure , interest use End-tidal Co2 measurement device `` Capnostream '' evaluate PaCo2 PaCo2 variation time evaluate . Measurements do normal expiration prolong active passive expiration maneuver .
DOC.brief_title: Use EtCO2 PaCO2 Predictor Under Non Invasive Ventilation ( NIV ) Cases Acute Hypercapnic Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: ICU patient equip arterial line NIV requirement Hypercapnia : PaCO2 > 45mmhg Severe hemodynamic instability Severe psychiatric disorder nasal lesion deny consent
